title.narrative: Procurement of Service Evaluating Millennium Villages in Northern Ghana

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of Service Evaluating Millennium Villages in Northern Ghana) is a component of Millennium Villages in Northern Ghana Evaluation reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £4,018,294. This component benefits Ghana, and works in the following sector(s): Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Itad. The start date is 23-05-2011 and the end date is 26-11-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2013 Quarter 3
